tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Played steady golf all week at his PGA TOUR China Series debut, shooting rounds of 71-71-70-71 at Mission Hills GC's Sandbelt Trails Course to T12…Missed the cut in his next start, at the Buick Open in Guangzhou. …In his next start, was T69 at the Lanhai Open…Missed the cut at the Earls Beijing Open.…Strung together four under-par rounds at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open in August (67-68-71-69) to finish solo 12th.
tourBios.personal: Golf hero is Tiger Woods…Enjoys listening to music.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 12th on the PGA Tour China Serie 2 times.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T87th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
